entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 10:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
